title: twig loop index
description: The loop.index variable allows you to get the current iteration of the loop.

title: twig loop index0
description: The loop.index0 variable allows you to get the current iteration of the loop (starting at 0).

title: twig loop revindex
description: The loop.revindex variable allows you to get the number of iterations from the end of the loop.

title: twig loop revindex0
description: The loop.revindex0 variable allows you to get the number of iterations from the end of the loop (starting at 0).

title: twig loop first
description: The loop.first variable allows you to check if the loop is on the first iteration.

title: twig loop last
description: The loop.last variable allows you to check if the loop is on the last iteration.

title: twig loop length
description: The loop.length variable allows you to get the number of items in the loop.

title: twig loop parent
description: The loop.parent variable allows you to get the parent loop.

title: twig else if
description: The else if tag allows you to add an else if condition to an if statement.

title: twig else
description: The else tag allows you to add an else condition to an if statement.

title: twig show
description: The show function allows you to display a variable in a safe way.

title: twig execute
description: The execute function allows you to execute a variable as a function.
